title: Cruz Colorada Park
description: A peaceful forested area ideal for hiking, picnicking, and birdwatching. With its winding trails and natural viewpoints, Cruz Colorada offers a refreshing break from urban life and a chance to connect with the region’s mountainous beaut.

title: Casa Maximiliano Ruiz Castañeda
description: Visit the former home of Acambay’s most renowned physician and researcher. This historic house now serves as a cultural space, showcasing local history, scientific contributions, and the legacy of a man who shaped public health in Mexico..

title: Valle de los Espejos
description: Located at the foot of the mountains, this scenic valley is known for its reflective rock formations and tranquil atmosphere. It’s a favorite spot for photography, nature walks, and quiet contemplation — a hidden gem in the heart of the Otomí highlands.
